website_summaries.verdict: The perfect combination of effective litter box and aesthetic home decor.
pros: Decorative house plant design is aesthetically pleasing
Large entry is ideal for regular scooping
Box doesn’t take up much room, but still has a spacious interior
cons: Included fern is not attached and is lightweight, making it easy for cats to run off with

customer_reviews.title: Potentially dangerous for curious cats!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to warn anyone considering buying this particular litter box for their cat; that the leaves and straw are potentially dangerous for a cat that chews and plays with it. My cat has just had to have surgery to remove the bits of leaves he ate from the plastic plant part. I am not trying to bash this product it is just not a good design for cats that get into stuff. Please consider this before buying. Or atleast throw out the leaves and straw.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a little spray paint!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! I used 2 cans of white spray paint and now have a beautiful litter box. I saw several people who didn't like the palm leaves but I don't think they look bad at all. I purchased a feed bin as a liner and use trash bags on the bottom. It's easy to clean and looks lovely! The only downside is putting it back together. I found it's difficult to line up the groove and opening after cleaning and now I mostly clean it while it's assembled so I don't have to bother putting it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: This Litter Box is the Cats Meow !!
customer_reviews.text: My cat and I Love this litter box! It's very attractive and hides the fact there is a litter box in my homes foyer - the only place I really had room to place it. Everyone who has come to my home doesn't realize what it is unless I tell them, then they are impressed and think it's really cool! The space inside is very large an it took almost a full 20 lb box of litter to fill it. I'm not using a liner in mine as don't feel it's necessary.
customer_reviews.author: LA_Sinatra

customer_reviews.title: Dont' waste your money. I can't believe this had such great reviews..this thing is a complete POS
customer_reviews.text: I can't say one good thing about this product. It came damaged with poor quality to begin with. See the pictures. The plastic is all messed up on the sides and to top it off they didn't even put the hole for the fake plant in the middle where it's supposed to go so the plant can't physically sit straight in the planter. Also, it is so flimsy sitting on top of the bottom piece there is no way my cats can use this as a litter box. Returning this immediately. Don't waster your money.
customer_reviews.author: AcuPUNKture

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good of an Idea as We’d Hoped
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a good idea but we didn’t end up using it as designed. Not wanting to take the top on and off every day as we cleaned the cat box, we at first tried to scoop the litter through the entrance hole. That proved too cumbersome to get the job done properly, plus the edges of the hole are kinda sharp. We then tried pulling the top off to clean the litterbox, but it’s not as easy as you’d think. We ended up using just the bottom as a big circular litterbox, which definitely defeats the purpose. For us, it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: SML

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, needs an artistic touch to complete
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concept, but they product needs some work. It comes looking very plastic and fake, and the plant looks cheap. With a few coats of spray paint and some new fake plants from Michael's, it's much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good concept but....
customer_reviews.text: This cat box is very very hard to put top on. The plastic is very thin and any pressure bends it out of line. The flowers are very cheap and won't stand up. Very disappointed! Do not recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mary anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good Function, Designed for Hilarity and Mess
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea, and I like the design. However, certainly you would think something designed for a cat would not include pull-apart grass. That lasted about a week. The leaves are next (see photo). I don't mind the cat climbing all over, but the decorative grass and filter are gone. As a litter box, it's in my living room and it's actually a nice addition, totally inconspicuous and keeps the litter from being far-flung. I can always add new faux foliage to the top. It's a good spot for him to be hilarious and keep his business to himself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks so much better than a traditional cat box
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it matches the photos and description nearly perfect. The tree that's include with it looks like twigs so I went out and purchase a different topper adding the old one into it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Romero

customer_reviews.title: plant looks really bad..
customer_reviews.text: Color makes it look fake, moss gets everywhere, plant looks really bad... but with a little work, this is the best litter box I've ever had. I spray painted the outside with Rustoleum Terracotta paint, replaced the moss with stones, and replaced the plant with another fake plant from Michael's, and it looks like a houseplant in a real pot if the door's facing the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Discount is false - this thing never sold for $99
customer_reviews.text: Review #2: "False Advertising" I bought this thing full price at $50. They're advertising it at $42 "discounted" from "$99" - isn't there some sort of clause in Amazon's terms against this? Review #1: "A hassle to clean, very difficult to put top on." I don't really understand how this thing has 4.5 stars. I honestly really tried to like it, was excited for it. The biggest complaint is how difficult it is to put on, makes cleaning the litterbox an absolute hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: This item arrived quickly and is very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived quickly and is very easy to put together. It is perfect in my screened patio! I bought a few clear plastic planter saucers at Walmart (1.54$) to put in the bottom and make it easier to clean. You need the 16 inch saucers. I also bought 3 plastic plants at .97$ to make the foliage look fuller. I am very pleased with my purchase. And it looks great on the patio!
customer_reviews.author: JAF

customer_reviews.title: Palm plant in our Florida room.
customer_reviews.text: We like this litter box very much. The bathroom would have been the perfect place for one but we have a mobile home and the bathrooms are too small for one. This litter box we placed in a corner of our Florida room and it fits in perfectly and looks nice. The palm branches blend in with the rest of the decor!
customer_reviews.author: crockett

customer_reviews.title: Its very large so its pretty obvious how poorly made the artificial plant is
customer_reviews.text: This was NOT worth the cost of the product. Its so cheaply made and hardly fits together correctly, and looks and feel so cheap. Its very large so its pretty obvious how poorly made the artificial plant is. It looks plastic in the photos but its that old fashioned, darker green cloth type fake plant that is very easy for cats to chew/eat. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Cross

customer_reviews.title: That's really the best word to describe this litter box
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! That's really the best word to describe this litter box. It's absolutely terrific! Well built with a sturdy lid (that fits on super easy - I don't understand how people can't get it on?!) and VERY VERY roomy! My cat loves it. He got right in and was chilling in the littler peeking out as if to say "this is awesome!!" I needed something to fit in what you can see if a very tiny space and it does so perfectly. I can't believe this thing doesn't cost $200 or more - and let me just say, I'd even pay that much for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cat box inside is very roomy
customer_reviews.text: Much larger interior than I would have thought and it's perfect, so the kits don't feel closed in and crowded while doing their business. Easy to clean, provided you have a rounded scooper. Did not use their plant,,,, nice idea, but it was so badly bent up in the packaging that it was not usable -- did not want a fake looking plant on my patio! If you take the top of, it's a bit frustrating trying to get it back on and re-seated. But overall I love this product. Would buy another, if the price was lower and they can keep the plant!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I love it but it's flawed
customer_reviews.text: I love this litter box! We have an office kitty and this has done a good job of hiding that fact. I gave this 4 stars because within a week, the "grass" that goes around the fake plant was ripped off and strewn around my office. AND now the kitty likes to play and chew on the plant. So, this part was a little poorly thought out. I'm going to have to look for a more sturdy option for the plant and, like another reviewer stated, will likely go to stones around the plant. I still love the litter box though!
customer_reviews.author: NessAmber

customer_reviews.title: Top doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: I get that most people receive one that fits just fine and that's great for y'all. But the one I received, the lip of the top is narrower than the lip of the bottom, just enough so that it can't even rest inside the bottom and be functional. I'm leaving it out in the sun in hopes I can "stretch" it a bit but this was money down the drain for me, especially considering the separate pan that had to be bought. PS: yes, it looks tacky, as others have said. But we knew that part already.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie V

customer_reviews.title: MADDENING  - - Top & Bottom Don't Fit Together!
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea for hiding the typical kitty litter box, and my cat seems to like it OK. However, I have not found a way to make the top FIT on the bottom and STAY there. I've had to just leave the top off the bottom so that my cat doesn't end up getting injured every time she tries to use the box. I'm giving one star for the cute idea but that's about it. I really would appreciate a solution to the "FIT" problem. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Barb

customer_reviews.title: Needs this liner!
customer_reviews.text: I like this, as much as you can like a cat toilet. I also got the recommended pan insert. It is only 4" tall and my cat peed right over the top of it, so the smelly urine pooled below it. I got this instead. It's about 3" taller and works much better!! Any livestock feeder with the same dimensions would work. Little Giant All-Purpose Tub, 6.5-Gallon, Green  These elastic liners work great. Kitty Cat AlfaPet Extra-Giant Elastic Sta-Put Litter Box Liners 10 Count (Pack of 2)
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I purchased 2, then came back and bought 4 more. I breed Himalayan and Persian cats. I have people come to my home all the time to pick kitties, they are astounded to find that these planters are actually litter boxes. I add flowers to the tops to changed them for different seasons.
customer_reviews.author: L. or R. P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Litter Box Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these boxes - if I could afford it I would be replacing all my others with one (and with 10 cats in the house there are boxes in every room.) They are so easy to clean with the rounded shape and seem to keep odor down fantastically. The cats love them - sometimes to the exclusion of some of the other boxes. Lots of room inside, tall enough for the big/tall cats. Well worth the money. I am saving up so I can get another one and replace one of the older boxes. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Angelique T. Fehr

customer_reviews.title: Chinese craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Lol!! Is this some kind of joke??? The lid doesn't even fit on the base! The Chinese craftsmanship really shines! I knew this product would most likely be cheaply made but I didn't know think it was going to be this cheap, to the point where it's not even functional. Well, I threw 70 dollars in the trash, or should I say kitty litter. I can deduce that all these 5 star reviews are fabricated.
customer_reviews.author: Liquidus

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: Did a size comparison to a water bottle. It’s bigger than I expected but it’s still very nice to look at. I plan inn added more greenery to make it look more real and like a pot plant than a litter box. My only complaint is that the lid doesn’t stay on very well so I’m worried about her knocking it off all the time getting in and out. It’s not very sturdy and I can’t glue it down because then I couldn’t clean it easily so I might add some hooks or locks to it to keep it in place for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect for larger cats
customer_reviews.text: This literally just makes my room look so much cuter! No more ugly litter boxes. In addition, my cat loves how roomie it is. She’s only 10 Ibs but was also sticking half out of regular litter boxes. Now she has so much room that she can organize how she uses the bathroom (pres on left and poops on right) lol the plant it pretty fake looking so I plan to change it one day. The filter is pointless. I wouldn’t even put it on a risk a potential foreign body since my cat likes to chew everything. I just put large rocks there instead and it’s so cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 8wks - DON’T PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality. Lip broke and now the liter box leans over. For the cost it’s a terrible investment. Absolutely disappointed. Can’t even get seller to stand behind product. DON’T PURCHASE THIS UNLESS YOU WANT TO WASTE MONEY. SELLER DOESN’T STAND BEHIND PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Britt84

customer_reviews.title: Ended up throwing away.
customer_reviews.text: The top always fell off. I had to buy artificial plants to add as what it came with was pathetic looking. The clumping litter for some reason stuck to the plastic and was hard to scoop out. Just went back to the old plastic litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Jswitt22

customer_reviews.title: Good look and excellent for LARGER CATS!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It just looks better than an ordinary litter box. I also happen to be a fan of fake plants to make spaces look more lively so I extra love it. You can bend the leaves however you like them. The diameter of the box is 20 inches so it’s great for larger cats, like mine. The opening is 9 inches x 9 inches wide. The box itself is probably 2 feet tall, adding the plant it’s probably about 4 feet tall total. I’m 5’9 and it hits at my elbows with the leaves branched out a little. P.S. Sorry for the weird photo angles. Had to balance on my legs ha
customer_reviews.author: Laci Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not for every cat
customer_reviews.text: My 20# male cat could not understand that he has to put his whole body inside the box. Front paws in, back paws out. Need I say more!!!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Best “hide the litter box” option out there
customer_reviews.text: The only downfall I want to say right off the bat is the grass-like straw at the base of the plants, my kitten got into it, ate it, and it was all over the apartment. That quickly went into the trash, I replaced it with medium sized rocks, and It doesn’t look too bad. Every single person that’s come over and seen the potted plant, didnt know it was the litter box until I said so. It fits into the corner of the bathroom. I think because the litter is enclosed, along with flushable litter & deodorizer, I dont ever smell a thing. It’s easy to clean, easy to maneuver, easy to carry the package up a flight of stairs!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing and cat approved
customer_reviews.text: I foster cats, so I sometimes have up to 10 cats/kittens to take care of and this litter box is absolutely perfect for my situation. Its sometimes frustrating to dump out old yucky litter, but it's probably something I'm doing wrong haha. I've had it for over a year now and it's still one of my best investments. But, the poor faux plant on top definitely has been destroyed so I would love of someone posts a link to a replacement plant, but I highly suggest this litter box to anyone who loves cats but doesn't enjoy the look of typical liter boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: No longer worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved it at first but the longer I've had it the more I hate it. Litter goes literally everywhere. I even bought a round insert box to try and help for an additional 21 dollars and it didn't. After having this since Sept of 2016 (its March 2017) it smells to high heaven. I clean it twice a day and empty it twice a week but the plastic box itself has adopted the smell of the cats urine and it's awful. At this point I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Fenimore

customer_reviews.title: Planter litter box
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this litter box! I’ve had mine for 2 years now and have never had a problem with it. Was just reading some of the reviews because I’m getting ready to order another one, only because I will soon add another cat, for a total of 3 cats. I replaced the fake moss with seashells soon after purchasing mine, because the cats played with it, scattering it everywhere. But I loved the ideas of spray painting it and adding different foliage/flowers!
customer_reviews.author: SJMcM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Wish I ordered sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Omg my Siamese and I are obsessed with this new litter box! It’s so cute! Much larger than I expected but great for small spaces! It really looks like a nice house plant! The litter box inside is very roomy and deep! My cat used to kick litter all over the floor with his old litter box (just the traditional open top pan style box) but that doesn’t happen anymore Bc of how it’s inclosed and the depth. He is a full size Siamese and has plenty of space. The instructions say to lift the top off to clean which isn’t necessary so it’s super easy to scoop. I wish I ordered this sooner! Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Joy

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out for my 2 cats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 2 cats and they have barely used it. Then, when I went to clean it the one day I realized their waste was getting trapped under the pan liner - gross! Sorry, Will not be using this any more.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who hate the look of a litter box
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is the best! I was hesitant to get a kitten because of how unsightly litter boxes can be but this one is perfect and you can’t even tell it’s a litter box! I have actually used a round plastic tray from the dollar store and just place it inside of this litter box, then when it gets kinda gross in a couple of weeks I take out the dollar store tray and throw in a new one! My kitty was a little curious at first to play with a leaves but now he’s fine. Super easy to take the top off the clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Hidden Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this box. I love it. My home is not that large, this was the perfect size and also looks nice in my living room. I purchased a stainless steel pan to go inside and it fits perfectly with the wood pellet litter. It was easy to put together and the color does not look bad at all. I saw where some people painted theirs but it really is not needed for my decor. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AloeSkin

customer_reviews.title: No one knows its a litter box
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small place and finding an area for the litter box is difficult so I wanted something that was decorative and fit in and this fit the bill. No one knows it s a litter box, it fits behind a chair and just looks like a weird fake plant. My cat took to it immediately with no problems and its big, but easy to scoop. I use pretty litter and one bag fits great and its easy to scoop and mix the litter. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Milweiser

customer_reviews.title: My cats hate this thing
customer_reviews.text: My cats hate this thing. The top keeps sliding down over the bottom causing the opening to not be as big. It looks confined for my cats to get in. What a waste of money. I tried to return after realizing my cats don't like this but my window has closed and I now have a fake looking plant thing taking up space.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the litter box collection!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say it took my cats about a week to start using this; however, once they did it became one of their preferred boxes. It works well, and surprisingly I’ve had a few visitors to the house think it was a real plant and not a litter box. I’m not sure how, as I agree the plant isn’t the greatest around, and I didn’t even replace with a better one. But I guess people perceive what they think should be there and don’t look too hard. So I’m extremely happy with this unit. It could use a long handled scooper as some folks have noted, but its not a huge priority to find one.
customer_reviews.author: SMG Pittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: ITS PURRRFECT AFTER A FEW FINISHING TOUCHES!
customer_reviews.text: The top is a little hard to line up and its a bit on the bigger side but overall after you give it a make over no regrets! My wife painted it in matte black using water based non toxic arylic paint on the outside only and added a couple more plants from micheals she said it only took her around 2 hours to complete and the paint dried quickly. We absolutely love it now oh yeah the cat loves it meow too!❤📦€🐱
customer_reviews.author: carissa

customer_reviews.title: Get creative with the potty box
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the cutest litter box! Just a few suggestions if you should buy this. Go to a craft store and purchase about 6 stems of your desired greenery. Arrange them and zip tie them together. Before you do this, cut the 6 stems a bit shorter then the fern stem that comes with the box. This way it will balance well when you insert the fern stem into the top allotted hole. I bought some potpourri that had shells and sticks and arranged them on the top. I have not used it yet so I will have to update later.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyofthesea

customer_reviews.title: it takes some time to get top to fit onto bottom half
customer_reviews.text: well, at first, i thought i got one of those i had read about, where the top does not fit the bottom,but, it did, it just toook both of my hands to get it to fit together. now i wonder if those other people just didn't try hard enough to get the top to fit onto the base, it DOES take a little effort and practice. then, there is some discolored stained areas on it. Fairly noticeable. I have not yet decided if i will bother returning for stains or not. but otherwise, i like it. I do plan to get a better plant and to line it with an 18 inch wide bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer33333

customer_reviews.title: What litter box??
customer_reviews.text: We just moved to a smaller apartment (went from 3 bedrooms to 1) and had no discrete places to put the litter box. I went back and forth with whether to buy this one, read all the reviews and was still undecided. I finally took the plunge and bought it and I am very pleased. The tree part is a little 'eh' as others have mentioned. It will need some enhancements to look better quality. Overall, I would buy again for the pleasure of having a hidden litter box.
customer_reviews.author: KSB

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: I love this litter box for my cat and she does too.. Pretty roomy on the inside for her. Blends in well with decor. it doesnt LOOK like a litter box. I have the opening turned towards the back so i dont have to look inside and she gets a bit of privacy. Easy to clean and exactly what i wanted.. Now, all someone needs to do is make one of those sifters to fit the bottom of this! But i would highly recommend this... i have a friend who bought one and used that textured paint to make it look like stone on the outside.. looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: 911Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Legit review.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this product for a long time. I think it’s too much money for the quality but it’s a great idea. My Maine Coon loves using it. Took a while to get used to but he loves urinating on the wall.. and that gets pretty gross and hard to clean. I wish they made specific liners for the litter box itself. It would have been a better bang for your buck if the inside was a nonstick materiel but this is what reviews are for. Not ideaI for older cats either as they can’t step that high. Maybe the company can toy around with more ideas on different looks. Works great otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Boston

customer_reviews.title: Can't even tell its a litter box!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment, and the last thing I want guests to see is my cat's dirty litter box. I have it placed in the corner of my living room with the opening facing the wall. No one ever knows it's a litter box! I've even gotten compliments on the plant itself, and when I tell people its a litter box they are completely baffled. My cat uses it with no problems, and the design is definitely a plus for cats who tend to spray because of the high plastic walls. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey West

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a little too big
customer_reviews.text: Okay don’t get me wrong I love this but it’s absolutely huge, about twice the size of a normal litter box. And my cat just removes all the things on top and it makes a total mess.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Stanfill

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for large cats
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life? I was hesitant to buy this litter box because I was afraid it wasn't going to be big enough for my large cat but it is great. Big enough for the beastie and easy to clean and easy on the eyes. I have multiple boxes of different sizes and this one is by far the most desirable to my cats. For those of you with cats that constantly try to dig outside the box, scoop litter out, or spend 15 minutes just digging, this thing really is perfect as it is large enough that they no longer feel the need the extra drama.
customer_reviews.author: JJ AZ

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend! Only needed minor tweaks for my esthetic
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't a huge fan of the way the plastic looked so I took the tips from the other reviews & got some spray paint to improve on it. I used a stone textured spray paint. I'm not hating the plastic plant that comes with it, but it would be easy enough if you wanted to swap it out for something else. The "moss" that comes with it looks more like cheap raffia and there's not much of it - I got some stones to use instead as another review recommended and I love how it looks! Overall, I'm really happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marcie 'n Howie

customer_reviews.title: Worth having with minor upgrades
customer_reviews.text: I love it and dislike it lol. It is a great size. And I have had people over who had no idea it was a cat box. The lid comes off easy. But. The lid is not as easy to put back on, needs better or bigger lip between top and bottom, I'm adding 2 latches to mine. The plant on top is weak and silly and so obviously fake looking, I've replaced it with a plant sitting on rocks. Very easy tomsprsy pain any color you want. I went with an aged brass look. Over all I would buy again, just know the issues.
customer_reviews.author: T. Seeger

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching, there's another option like this, don't get this
customer_reviews.text: There is a major design flaw with how the top does - or rather does not attach to the bottom. I've never had difficulty before doing this with b the booda boxes. There is such a thing lip that the top fell into the litter. I needed to wear gloves to match up the lid to the bottom. It's gross. Nice conceit. The top is so small and you would need to glue rocks and plants on top of the filter so it doesn't spill out when you take the top off. I was excited to get this and now I can't understand the high reviews.
customer_reviews.author: LolasMom

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to do some DIY
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea, but it’s too plain. They should do something about the design. The box is too expensive for this design. They should make it look more like a plant. My cat got obsessed with those leaves. She was feeling like in a jungle. She damaged it all, so I changed to artificial succulent flowers, repainted and added some details. Came out amazing! Like the most buyers I also bought a plastic feeder and some bags for inside. It’s more comfortable to clean this way.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together easy to clean! Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this litter box/potted plant.. I was sick of traditional litter boxes and we just painted the sunroom.. I saw this and it had a lot of good reviews so I bought it.. well I’m glad I did.. it’s huge but not obtrusive so it’s fits nicely in a corner, easy to put together and easy to clean.. I didn’t put any other pan inside for me the litter in the bottom half was fine.. it comes with Easter type grass in brown and the plant which bends easily.. it snaps together and my 2 year old cat loves it she weighs about 10-12 lbs.. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Box!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this cat box. Most people who come over have no idea that it is in-fact a cat box. My cats are comfortable using it. I personally didn't use the torn up foliage it came with to put at the base of the stem since it seemed messy. Otherwise the only thing I would have them change is its sturdiness. If it was made thicker it would hold better. It takes a bit of concentration when connecting the top piece back onto the base after scooping. I still really love this product and would be interested in purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great option for small apartments.
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny apartment and am planning on adopting a cat in the upcoming weeks so I wanted to find something ahead of time to prevent me from having to have a litter box just out in my living room when people come over. This is great and was easy to put together. Only complaint is that I wish it came in other colors but I’m planning on doing what others have done and painting it, swapping out the fake palm leaves with some fake flowers, and just overall dressing it up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome, people don’t even know it’s a litter box!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical at first, some of the reviews weren’t that great about the plant quality, and the color. But I think it’s fantastic! It’s exactly what I want because it’s going in my powder room that everyone uses downstairs. And I just didn’t want to have a gross big cat box on display! This is the best invention ever! It’s very easy to clean. However, I do find that my cats somehow kick a lot of the litter out. But I also bought the Farm watering bowl and litter liners. I’m going to see if that will help.
customer_reviews.author: Winky

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this just need to sand a bit
customer_reviews.text: It’s huge inside He loves it ! I’m getting a bigger plant-pot-base because this is very wide at the bottom which he loves so I guess I do too lol I wish it had a plastic flap over the hole so the smell could stay in and I did need to file the edges of the hole as they are cut at a sharp angle that can slice your hands if they are probably as soft as mine 😅😅🤦🏽‍♀️ But I love the way it looks so I didn’t mind putting in some extra work to sand it and get it a proper base and I just found plastic flaps that you can attach 🙌🏾
customer_reviews.author: Jizhell

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant! LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in LOVE with this litter box. Holy crap. The big was humungous, but the piece instructions were super clear and simple to understand. Literally just fill the pan with litter (or use your own inside it), put the top lid on, put the filter on top of it and put the plant in the middle of the top. So simple! Even provides fake but cute moss type material to hide the filter underneath the plant! Adorable and sooo worth the price! I can have a litter box in my foyer now without struggling to find a place for it! Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Seidel

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome litter box for large cats!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my large, 15-lb orange male cat. He was too large for the previous litter box I bought him and I always hated smelling his litter box. When this product arrived, it was very easy to put together and I was thrilled that no litter box linings were needed! My cat immediately used this litter box and did his "flinging of the litter " . I noticed that the smell was masked and he was not able to fling his litter on the floor like he used to. This is an excellent litter box for larger cats and the assembly is quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: vickie6

customer_reviews.title: The plant is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I was really really excited about this litter box. However, I am going to have to spend extra money to put something else in place of the leaves it came with. They are absolutely terrible. They don't look anything like the picture. They are thin and sparse and look really goofy on this giant potter. The color is not so great either. The picture makes the plant look bright and vibrant but in person they look more like a pastel green. They've got some sort of white stuff on them. It just doesn't look right. I like the litter box itself though. I would have given 5 stars if it came with a better plant.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylan Rickman

customer_reviews.title: Cat immediately ate the decorative plant on top.
customer_reviews.text: This plant litter box looks super great in our home, and our cats like it. But my cats like it too much. They immediately ate the fake grass and decorative plant on top. And my one cat sleeps inside it, so the other cat can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Attractive alternative to the Smart Box
customer_reviews.text: We love the hidden cat litter box. We need to keep a box indoors for our one indoor/outdoor cat, just in case! In our small apartment where space is precious, this box fits right in the corner and the “leaves” look better than an open space. One reviewer suggested adding leaves from Michaels or Hobby Lobby to make it look a little nicer, but it definitely serves its purpose as is. It is small and when cleaning, the litter does get all over. I have an additional liner type pan inside the Hidden litter box because it’s been my experience that scratched plastic becomes porous and can stink over time. I would definitely recommend this pricey cat box.
customer_reviews.author: Beene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent litter box
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase, what a great concept! I was worried that my cat won’t want to go in it at first, but I moved some of her used litter in there and she started going right away. I also inserted a round 18” basin inside, that I can line with plastic liners and makes cleanup much easier. The pot is beautiful and it looks like stone. The foliage is not that great - not rich enough and looks very fake, I will have to buy a replacement. I’m giving it 5 stars because it is an excellent replacement for that unsightly litter box!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great disguise!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty small apartment so I really like having the litter box disguised as a plant! I wish the greenery that came with was fuller, I’ll probably replace it with something nicer. I would also suggest using more litter than normal in this because it seems that the clumps stick to the sides more than a normal litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Fetters

customer_reviews.title: Camouflaged litter box that my cats actually love to use.
customer_reviews.text: While a little pricey for a litter box, it does effectively hide its true function and is great for use in the living room, family room, or a bedroom. Large cats have adequate space inside and it is pretty easy to clean. As a pot holding a fake palm, it actually isn’t too bad looking. You could easily improve on the greenery, if you wanted and could play with the finish to give it a more pottery-like appearance, if that was important to you. We have been very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CLM

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pros: really cute! 2 of my 4 cats cats absolutely love it. They throw litter against the side and it goes nowhere Cons: finding urine coating the outside/wall facing edge. Unsure if cat is literally marking the outside or it’s dripping through the “crack” between upper and bottom pieces. Occasionally has a tendency to absorb the awful ammonia urine smell needing frequent all-over cleaning with a wipe. As others have mentioned, throw away the crappy twig of green and the choking hazard stringy “base” material.
customer_reviews.author: soccerstar666

customer_reviews.title: Super discreet
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my entry way with unscented clumping litter. no one can either smell the litter box or realizes there is on there. I thought I would paint it immediately, but ended up keep it au natural. It is NOT terracotta colored. More taupe... so if you want that orange terracotta color, you'll need to paint it. The plant is not that skimpy, in fact, I don't have enough space for a super bushy plant, so it works for me. I don't use an additional liner, I found it isn't necessary and super easy to clean this out daily and then wash it once a month.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: So glad I have it.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is more hideous than a cat liter box. I hate cat liter boxes. And, we have to keep ours in the bathroom, which is so unsightly. This makes everything look so much nicer and cleaner. I really love this. It’s kind of expensive for what it is, but it’s worth it to me for the improved look of my bathroom. This could be improved upon though. And easier way to carry it for one. It’s kind of a pain to lug the nasty liter pan out when it’s time to clean and refill. A nicer artificial plant on top would be great too. But again, I love it and I’m thankful I have it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Problem Solved!
customer_reviews.text: There is a problem with the hidden cat litter box when you add the lift out pan to fit inside. There were other cat owners having the same problem where there cat is using the litter box and the pee runs in between the pan and the litter box. I just found the solution! I put 3 thin plastic place mats inside the pan which doesn’t allow cat to “pee over the side of the added pan” It works beautifully! (And I purchased the place mats from Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Diane Adamec

customer_reviews.title: ☆DO NOT BUY THE PAN ☆
customer_reviews.text: ☆☆☆☆DO NOT BUY THE PAN ☆☆☆☆ After just a few days i had about an inch of pee in the bottom of the pan between the pot and the pan. Now my whole room smells like piss. If you buy this, just pour your litter straight into the base DO NOT bother with a pan or bags, it just causes a mess. It's a pain in the you know what lining up the two pieces after you scoop your litter too. It looks cool, but it's not worth the smell, clean up, or hassle of linking it up.
customer_reviews.author: T Wag

customer_reviews.title: On point!
customer_reviews.text: This is another product I read all reviews and I’m happy to say this buy was a HIT!!! Some reviews had customers not happy removing the top to clean but I personally don’t have an issue with it. It’s more of a personal choice. I like the fact that is wider than a regular litter box and we left the opening on the side for privacy for our cat. When he comes out, we just clean a few litter on the side. The look is priceless as it looks like another potted plant in our lanai. Would def buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect
customer_reviews.text: We needed a second litter box for our aging cat, the only option was in a main living area which was less than ideal. This has been great, we put a cute rug under it and no one guessed it was a litter box. It is the most affordable option for “hiding” a litter box that I could find. The faux plant is sparse and doesn’t look natural. I’m planning to eventually spray paint the bottom and replace the plant on the top. There isn’t anything out there like this one, I do recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I debated getting this box for a long time, on the one hand it seemed like a cute option for something that is otherwise a big eye sore but on the other, it was significantly more expensive than a normal litter box. Two separate friends of mine bought this box for their cats and after seeing it in person in their homes and finally pulled the trigger and I'm so happy I did! It's large and definitely noticeable but I've turned the opening away from immediate view and it blends into my decor like just another large potted plant; eye sore issues: resolved!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie C.

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but can look amazing
customer_reviews.text: Ok I need to right this review. The product is not perfect BUT can look amazing. Mine arrived and the plastic had a lots of imperfections so made me a little worried that even after spray paint would look bad so I decided to use the stone texture spray paint and OMG looks like stone. It covered all the weird texture from the plastic and feels like real stone. The plant is cheap I agree but it works. Eventually I will find some other plant that looks more realistic but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Julis82

customer_reviews.title: Hate grass & filter, LOVE litter box!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE! I have a multiple cat household and always hated the bulky jumbo litter boxes. They were an eyesore and always a pain to clean. This litter box however is great, easy on the eyes and heady to clean. I have a big boy (Maine Coon) and a petite girl (Siamese) and both like using the box. Only downside is the “grass” that was put on top of the “filter”. The grass was instantly thrashed and devoured by big boy and the filter really does nothing, it’s just a thin piece of foam.
customer_reviews.author: Nitsuj Regnilsna

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Love this as a disguise!!! Looks great in any corner of the room. I spray painted mine gray to match my stuff and it turned out perfect. I tried with and without the round plastic insert with and without a bag... too messy for me! I found the easiest way to clean and keep it clean is by using nothing and putting the actual litter in it by itself. It takes a lot Of litter so I recommend the scoopable kind so you only have to add vs replace after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: wonderful for small space
customer_reviews.text: moved to a small apartment with no extra room for a litter box. I purchased this and put it in the corner of the living room. You would never know it's a litter box. I recommend purchasing the rubber round liner" Little Giant Farm & Ag 3-Gallon Rubber Feed Pans" or something similar so that cleaning is easy. I also purchased a mat to collect the litter so that it doesn't get all over the hardwood floors. Don't know what I would have done without this litter box. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Cats favorite litter box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after my cat stopped using her other litter box that was harder to get to (she's getting older and we noticed not as great at jumping as she used to be). It's pretty and adds some color to my office/cat room. It's easy to clean because you just take the top part off but you can scoop daily daily by just using the scoop through the hole. I would say it is a big litter box and not for small spaces. My cat is also larger in general, 11lbs, and has space when she goes so it does work for larger cats.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Studio Apartments!
customer_reviews.text: When I moved from a house to a studio, I could not figure out where to put the cat box where it was not out in the open and taking up space. This little box is a perfect solution! I have a 12lb cat and while it's a little small for him he doesn't seem to mind. I spotted him once sticking his head out of box while doing his business and didn't seem to mind. I went out to the local feed store and found a 18 inch round feed bowl that fits snugly in the bottom with litter lining bags for $12. All and all so glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: It's goofy looking. I spray painted it a bronze color to match my decor....still goofy looking, but solves the problem of having an open litter tray in the front room. The spray paint helped to not make it stand out like a sore thumb. The greenery is tacky too, but it's not a deal breaker. No smell escapes and it's easy to get in the opening with a scooper. More importantly, my 9 pound - 2 year old cat used it right of the bat. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderful. It got four stars because I had to buy an insert for it that makes it work better that should come with it instead and because getting the top back on is a tiny bit tricky since the groove that the bottom fits in is so narrow and the top is a bit flexible. Otherwise it's perfection. I love it. The plant is obviously fake but that can be remedied in time with a replacement. It is much bigger than I thought it would be for some reason. Even in my 3 bedroom home I had to find a place to put it. But I am loving it and so is my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best concealed litter box
customer_reviews.text: This completely gets rid of the gross litter box look! No one even knows it’s a litter box until I tell them. I have it placed in a corner not right against the wall, with the opening facing the wall so you can’t see the opening. Only downfall is, it can be tough to get the top back on after cleaning but I’ve gotten the hang of it. Still well worthy of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUY
customer_reviews.text: Just opened. Very easy to assemble. No strange smells. Neat packaging. Definitely can be spruced up to fit your needs appearance wise. The plant spreads wider than expected. I will be adding more rocks to the top of mine. Not a big fan of the moss that came with it. I placed a basin from my local feed store inside and it fits just fine. I purchased this because my cat has transitioned to our patio at our new house and having a bulky cat box on our nice patio was a no go. Would reccommend.
customer_reviews.author: airgem1995

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for over a year now. I have mine with the opening facing the corner and 6 inches from each wall. Guests can't tell this is a litter box unless they really inspect it. Have not tried to spray paint mine yet but probably will. I have no issues putting the lid on and my 10 lb cat has never knocked the lid off. She is 5 so after a quick nibble she learned the leaves were not edible and had no ingestion issues. My only issue is that the feed pan that fits this if you have a high pee-er, it just runs down the side to under the litter pan.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I liked the hidden litter box to start. I used it for almost a 6 months. I noticed with this litter box the smell became trapped in the plastic and the plant on top. It was terrible. I attempted to bleach it repeatedly but it didn’t help. The smell was strong and just know i clean my litter box everyday in the evenings to avoid the issue of smell and even though I cleaned it everyday it still trapped the smell in. I eventually ended up throwing the litter box away after multiple attempts of different techniques of trying to get the smell to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Sa Ruh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars For Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, cats use it, keeps stinky contained, looks nice. Only took one star off for the price and the fact that there are deadly accessories included. Please do not put that fake grass stuff on this thing, it can hurt your cat if they eat it. Also the plant is crap quality for the price tag. Get some shells or rocks and a different plant for it, preferably something that won't kill your animal if they consume it!
customer_reviews.author: Real Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Best way to hide an unsightly cat box
customer_reviews.text: We ditched our regular cat box in the living room for one of these. Our living room is large enough that it just looks like a planter in the room. We like it a lot but one definitely should replace the top grassy area with something else because the cats will want to attack and destroy it. It also doesn't slide back on really easily without exactly lining it up. I love the concept though and we'll probably get another one for the back room.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Anne

customer_reviews.title: What an upgrade. From ugly mess, to cute and clean.
customer_reviews.text: The cutest, minimalist cat litter box I’ve been seen. Such a great idea. Litter boxes are always so ugly and messy. This hidden litter box is cute, and my jerk cats can’t kick the litter out into the floor. So happy with my purchase. Highly recommend. I think Finn approves of the new upgrade too.
customer_reviews.author: Boardwalk Pomade

customer_reviews.title: Great Litter Box Option
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this for my cat litter box. It's hidden in plain sight...no one suspects it's a litter box. I bought a round plastic bin to insert to hold the litter. It works great. The only cons are: 1) i replaced the mossy stuff with rocks so my cat couldn't eat it or the filter. 2) when I remove the cover to clean the litter, it take a little bit to align to slot to put it back on. But it's not difficult. Honestly for the money and to achieve a certain functional yet nice look, it's been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Marge W

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I really like this and so does my cat but I can’t get the little plant on top to stay because it keeps falling over. Other than that it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Cayla

customer_reviews.title: SO NICE WE BOUGHT IT TWICE!
customer_reviews.text: Love this box so much I am no longer embarrassed that my boys insist on having a litter box by our front door and in TV room. Once we got the second one I put the top greenery with the first box which def made it look more real! The second I had to attempt a diy after seeing everyones amazing ideas and I love succulents! $10 at Dollar tree later I am so happy!
customer_reviews.author: John C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great box, sad plants, but over all great
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this wouldn't be big enough for my adult cat, but it's really big! The same amount of Kitty litter that I would use in her old box fills maybe half. It's wonderful!! She needed space to stand but also likes to be covered when she uses the box. This is exactly what we needed. The only down side is the plant it a bit sad looking and only has the leaf print on one side, not both. The print also faces into the center, so no matter what way you have the leaves facing it's the wrong way. Over all, I'm happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Maddy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love this litter box!!
customer_reviews.text: This is terrific! Easy to put together. Easy to clean. And no one can really tell that it's a litter box just by looking at it. Bonus, the cats amuse themselves with the palm tree on top. We are dumping the other covered litter box and putting in another one like this for its ease of cleaning. It's bigger and deeper, and now that they have this litter box, they don't seem to use the old ones anymore, well, at least, not as often.
customer_reviews.author: Llcrocolyle

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I painted a Hogwarts silhouette on the base, replaced the fern with a DIY Whomping Willow made from shipping paper and twigs, and then put a tiny (1/43 scale) Ford Anglia "flying" around it. I recommend purchasing the Little Giant Dura-Flex Plastic Utility Pan (3-Gallon, Green) as well, which fits purrfectly inside the litter box.  I also purchased the Petmate Booda Round Edge Litter Scoop, which has proven to be very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Chic with a little DIY
customer_reviews.text: If you LOVE cats, but hate the aesthetic of a catbox, like me, this is a PERFECT solution. I decided to upgrade mine with some spray paint (sandstone & hammered black), sisel rope, and hot glue for a total of about $15 and I intend to get some better foliage for the top, but how cute! If you turn the hole toward the wall(& keep it clean/use quality odor control litter), I guarantee people won't know it's a catbox. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: W/out A Doubt The Best Idea For A Hidden Kitty Litter Box Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is w/out a doubt the absolute BEST hidden litter box design ever! It's nice looking/roomy/my kitty took to it immediately & it's incredibly better looking than an open dusty litter box. She's a chubby 15 lbs & fits into it well. Very easy to put together & I can't understand all the reviewers complaints about the palm plant leaves. It's all tall palm leaves & none of them were crushed. (maybe the sellers listened to complaints?) If you've got to have a litter box in your living area...this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy Langford

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great,Works Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Too bad this is made of flimsy plastic that makes it impossible to fit the lid back onto the base without it falling off and often into the litter pan. The problem is that due to this flimsy construction, it is nearly impossible to line up the groove of the lid with lip of the base, making cleaning this litter box a nightmare. Sure, it does look good and a whole lot better than an ordinary litter pan, but Jesus, the problem with cleaning it undoes what you gain in ethetics! I love and hate this thing! In the end, I'll return it and see if there is something similar but better made and easier to use (clean)
customer_reviews.author: LouCutrone

customer_reviews.title: Decorative and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. Now I don't have to look at the ugly litter box and our cats have some privacy while using the restroom. I bought some fake flowers to go along with the plant and also instead of using the moss looking stuff that they give you to put around the top I bought a bag of stones from the dollar store it looks much nicer and way less messy since one our cats loves to play with stuff like that. I would totally recommend this to anyone with cats.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara N

customer_reviews.title: NO SMELL!!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought for the price this litter box better be magical....and it is! Aside from the fact it conseals the litter box, there is no smell. I am sure the cat hates it because cats are evil, however I am happy with it. I did buy a pan to go inside and sifting liners because ....well...anything to make emptying the box eaiser. I know it's kinda expensive but it really does look like a planter and the filter that comes with does help with the smell. :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

product_meta.title: Good Pet Stuff Plant Hidden Litter Box
product_meta.description:
Color:BrownThe Hidden Litter Box is the largest of the hidden litter boxes. The litter box to humans looks like a planter when turned around towards the corner of the wall. Your pets will be able to crawl inside the base of the planter and use it as a litterbox with great privacy. The base can also be lined with bedding to use as a pet bed instead. Vented design and filter controls dust and odor!

Comes complete with plant, filter and moss just add litter. Durable polypropylene construction. Large capacity pot great for large cats and multi-cat households. Dimensions Without Plant: 20" wide x 19 3/4" high Dimensions With Plant: 20" wide x 55" high Due to its dimensions and/or weight, this item ships via GROUND service only.
feature_bullets: Large-capacity cat litter box looks like a real clay pot. The plants and the parts are nested between the top and bottom section of the litter box.
Filtered vented system works to control dust and odor
Designed for large cats and multi-cat households
Measures 42 inches high with included plant; 1-year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
